name: Kaiju Kitty MVP
description:
This is a short MVP of Kaiju Kitty, a game where you play as a cat that grows larger by doing exactly what cats do best... Causing mass amounts of chaos!

-CONTROLS-

This game currently only supports mouse and keyboard input by default.

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Shift - Sprint

Ctrl - Crouch

Mouse - Look

Mouse 1 - Attack

TAB - Show timer

-SUPPORT DEVELOPMENT-

  If you're interested in supporting the full game's development, check out my Patreon! Here you'll get to see behind the scenes updates and even get access to early builds of the game for testing.

Thank you for playing!
